definition: Jimmy Liao (1958-), pen name of 廖福彬[Liao4 Fu2 bin1], Taiwanese illustrator and picture book writer

sentences.english: There is a tree every few meters on either side of the road .
sentences.chinese: 路的兩邊每隔幾米就有一棵樹。

sentences.english: Over 20 metres or so, there's a telephone-box there.
sentences.chinese: 再走二十幾米，那裏有一個電話亭。

sentences.english: A ten meters tall arbutus, summer, laden with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 一棵十幾米高的楊梅樹，初夏，結滿了果實。

sentences.english: Both doors are several meters high.
PleASe send AS additional detailed information and also a few metro of sample of these two kinds for our examination.
sentences.chinese: 請寄來更詳細的資料和幾米此兩種貨的樣品以便檢視。

sentences.english: I would only have to walk a few metres and I could touch one.
sentences.chinese: 那時，我只需要走出幾米就能觸摸到其中一座冰川。

sentences.english: It lies down a few meters away from me.
sentences.chinese: 它在我身旁幾米處臥下。

sentences.english: In fact, she was lying metres away in the intensive care unit of the same hospital.
sentences.chinese: 而實際上，他女兒就在幾米外同所醫院的重症病房裏。

sentences.english: The valley’s flooroccasionally contains a perennially frozen lake with ice several metersthick.
sentences.chinese: 峽谷地表有着覆蓋幾米厚冰的永凍湖。

sentences.english: Just a few meters ahead, you run into a colonist who warns you not to go up the road.
sentences.chinese: 走了幾米有一個殖民者會過來警告你別繼續向前。

sentences.english: Please send as additional detailed information and also a few metres of samples of these two kinds for our examination.
sentences.chinese: 請寄來更詳細的資料和幾米此兩種貨的樣品以便檢視。

sentences.english: The plant may grow to a height of several meters, depending on soil conditions.
sentences.chinese: 這種植物可以長到好幾米高，視土壤條件而定。

sentences.english: The car pulled up several metres in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 那臺車在我們前面幾米遠的地方停了下來。

sentences.english: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 當我們爬完最後幾米時，我們感到一種成功感。

sentences.english: Hotel Ulises is located in the heart of Ceuta, just a few metres from Ribera Beach.
sentences.chinese: 酒店位於休達的中心，到裏貝拉格蘭海灘只有幾米。

sentences.english: The rings of slewing bearings with a diameter of several metres are frequently cut into segments for ease of transport or installation.
sentences.chinese: 五環的迴轉軸承直徑幾米切成段常爲便於運輸和安裝。

definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
MURAKAMI Haruki (1949-), Japanese novelist and translator
Brave New World, novel by Aldous Huxley 阿道司·赫胥黎[A1 dao4 si1 · He4 xu1 li2]
Les Misérables (1862) by Victor Hugo 維克多·雨果|维克多·雨果[Wei2 ke4 duo1 · Yu3 guo3]
